pages.text:
$(c:/ftbquests open_book 11DB53435CA1D59E)&c$(l)---> Open Quest Page <--- $(/c)$(br)&rIn CTE2, some Vanilla stats have compatibility with Mine and Slash!
Vanilla : &aMine and Slash&r
Health : &b+0.5% Magic Shield&r
Armor : &b+0.1% Gear Defense&r
Armor Toughness : &b+0.1% Gear Defense&r
Attack Damage : &b+0.5% Total Damage&r
Luck : &b+3% Magic Find&r
Additionally, Enchantment compatibility is included.

You can see how the Enchantment affects Mine and Slash stats in the &bEnchantment description in blue&r.
Enchantment stat bonuses cap out per item equal to the Max Enchantment level + 1. For example, Protection gives +2% Armor, but each item with this enchantment can only give +12%, even if you somehow get a Protection VIII item. However, there is also a global cap of the item cap x3. If you equipped 4 Protection VI items, you would receive only +36% Armor.
